Config.name: CCMNa22Cuts
Config.Param: CCMAccumWaveformTriangle Which CCMAccumWaveformMethod to use in finding the events. Options are: - CCMAccumWaveformTriangle - CCMAccumWaveformTrianglePulseCut - CCMAccumWaveformStart - CCMAccumWaveformStartPulseCut
CCMDynamicLengthEvent Which CCMEvnetFinderID to use in finding the events options: - CCMDynamicLengthEvent - CCMFixedLengthEvent
tree_lengthCut Name of the output tree
0 Flag to remove events that were not built with the AccumWaveformMethodID/EventFinderID combination that is looked for
1 Flag to remove events match the AccumWaveformMethodID/EventFinderID combination that is looked for but do not pass cuts
1 Flag to reject events based off previous activity in the same DAQ window
1600 The time to reject the event if a previous event falls before by the amount specified. The time should be in nanoseconds
1 Flag to reject the event if the charge distribution is not "nice"
0 Lowest event niceness value allowed (not needed if DoNicenessCut = false)
2.5 Highest event niceness value allowed (not needed if DoNicenessCut = false)
1 Flag to turn on veto cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
3 Number of veto tubes to cut on (not needed if DoVetoCut = false)

0 Flag to reverse the veto cut or not (not needed if DoVetoCut = false) Normally events are cut if grater than or equal to NumVetoCut if ReverseVeto = 1 then events less than NumVetoCut would be removed
0 Flag to turn on prompt energy cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
10 Lowest prompt energy value allowed in PEs (not needed if DoEnergyCut = false)
100 Highest prompt energy value allowed in PEs (not needed if DoEnergyCut = false)
0 Flag if true will reject events if max of waveform is not in the prompt region
1 Flag to turn on a position cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
0 Lowest radius value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false)
0.95 Highest radius value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false) 0.05 for Na22 calibration
-0.4 Lowest z-position value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false) -0.2 for Na22 calibration
0.4 Highest z-position value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false) 0.05 for Na22 calibration
1 Flag to turn on DAQ Time cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
-7000 Lowest DAQ time value allowed in nanoseconds (not needed if DoTimeCut = false)
4000 Highest DAQ time value allowed in nanoseconds (not needed if DoTimeCut = false)
1 Flag to turn on event length cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
0 Lowest event length value allowed in nanoseconds (not needed if DoLengthCut = false)
100 Highest event length value allowed in nanoseconds (not needed if DoLengthCut = false)
